label: 三昧月輪
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Name of an elementary method of contemplation.  The practitioner sits with his legs crossed facing a large painting of a moon disc containing a white, eight-petaled lotus and the Sanskrit character for a."  He forms mudras, regulates his breathing, and contemplates the resemblance of his heart to a full moon (p. 623n)."
